Text:
I've been waiting for this to drop.
Thank you kind sir ;)

Excellent upload, including .cue and .log files.
All files are clean and easy to burn.
Original album has been warmly remastered, in my opinion. Some will like it and some will not, as always. Second disc with live concert is okay.
Thank you politux.
Thanks so much! I've owned this album about five times over so far. Time to listen to it again.

@pumplestiltskin

Enjoy... your username made me LOL.  :D
